entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening then snow. Local blowing snow before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
